original_text: and the plan of all that he had in mind for the courts of the house of the Lord, all the surrounding chambers, the treasuries of the house of God, and the treasuries for dedicated gifts;
korean_text: 또 그가 영감으로 받은 모든 것 곧 여호와의 성전의 뜰과 사면의 모든 방과 하나님의 성전 곳간과 성물 곳간의 설계도를 주고

sentences.original_text: and the plan of all that he had in mind
for the courts of the house of the Lord
the treasuries of the house of God
and the treasuries for dedicated gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 구별하여 바친 물건을 위한 보물창고
